scripts.build: echo "Skipping API build (infra/lambda provides the runtime)"
scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('No API dev server in public repo')"
scripts.deploy:monolith: npm run bundle:monolith && npm run zip:monolith && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-1 --function-name mbapp-nonprod-objects --zip-file fileb://dist/mbapp-nonprod-objects.zip
scripts.zip:tf: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$out='..\\..\\infra\\terraform\\build'; if(-not (Test-Path $out)){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $out | Out-Null }; $zip=Join-Path $out 'objects.zip'; if(Test-Path $zip){ Remove-Item $zip -Force }; Compress-Archive -Path .\\dist\\ -DestinationPath $zip -Force"
scripts.build:tf: npm run bundle:tf && npm run zip:tf
